quotes: refrain from sending your kid(s) to 'institutes of learning'. they will (definitely) end up getting bullied by mightier students (or people of influence) there. homeschool them while you can :)
do not correct a teacher—even when they are wrong—in front of the class, because you might end up getting an 'F' in the subject.
people don't like being corrected by someone of lesser authority.
do not parody others. someday, you will be the one being parodied.
things have a way of getting back to you.
consider not getting born if you don't want to die. the only people who end up dead are the ones who have once come into existence.
avoid using autocorrect. the autocorrect feature gives rise to unnecessary embarrassment.
do not sow what you cannot reap. for instance, do not be a grim reaper.
don't do drugs. be a software engineer instead.
stop reading fanfiction. it's a waste of time.
never set a pun on sherlock's name as your lockscreen password. you will not like it when you end up like irene adler from the show.
don't just tell stories. try making some videos too.
what is going to happen next is very obvious. stop getting baited by stupidly dumb video titles.
do not claim your students' research paper as yours. it is very immoral (and [poopy]) to do so.
brush your teeth 5 times a day. 5 is greater than 2.
contribute to open source projects. feel happy like never before.
do not make puns in front of people who can't understand them. puns are an insult to mankind.
do not post original songs or song covers to youtube. the umg and likewise will claim you (along with the song) in no time.
